<h4 class="tw">Tapestry on Twitter</h4><p>Did you Know: We also run groups for <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23YoungerPeople">#YoungerPeople</a> which have <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Dementia">#Dementia</a> in <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Havering">#Havering</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Romford">#Romford</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Hornchurch">#Hornchurch</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Essex">#Essex</a><span class="date"></span></p><p><a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Dancing">#Dancing</a> at <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Hornchurch">#Hornchurch</a> for people with <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23dementia">#dementia</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Havering">#Havering</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Romford">#Romford</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Essex">#Essex</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23fun">#fun</a> <a href="http://t.co/0mdYd12hyv">http://t.co/0mdYd12hyv</a><span class="date"></span></p><p>Balloons at our <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Hornchurch">#Hornchurch</a> group for people with <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23dementia">#dementia</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Havering">#Havering</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23Essex">#Essex</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/search?q=%23funtime">#funtime</a> <a href="http://t.co/JLll3UOFQY">http://t.co/JLll3UOFQY</a><span class="date"></span></p>
